name: main natural
description:
You can already get a taste of it here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GtBdDr2gTxg&feature=youtu.be
Exit Theatre Mode The game takes place in an alternate timeline where modern society was overrun by aliens two hundred years ago, and you play as a young astronaut who was long ago captured and imprisoned by them. Now stranded on an alien world, you must save humanity by fighting your way through deadly combat, exploring, and escaping and returning to the surface to claim your freedom. The game is currently in Early Access, but it was recently released to the public, and Outhouse Media has posted many more screenshots on their website. While the game is still in alpha, the developer says they're excited to see if this unique take on the strategy franchise is the one that catches on. Turns out, it's doing quite well on Steam's Greenlight. Outhouse Media is promising aphasia-friendly content, and we're eager to see what it looks like when this unique take on the strategy franchise does well. Joe Skrebels is IGN's UK News Editor, and he loves anything that has to do with penguins. Follow him on Twitter.
